name: Title Awase
overview: Title Awase is a mini game from Konami for the MSX2. It was part of the fifth of five Konami's Game Collections released on a 3.5" diskette. The game has enhanced SCC+ music, when used with the 'SCC+ Sound Cartridge' from the Konami game 'Snatcher' or 'SD Snatcher'. Title Awase is a memory game with the pictures of various Konami MSX game images on the memory cards.
